actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to assure that living expense deductions of Members of Congress be substantiated and auditable.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the provision which allows Members of Congress an income tax deduction without substantiation for living expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to assure that living expense deductions of Members of Congress be substantiated and auditable.
